info.name: highDEAS: reMetro 1.0
info.description:
So apparently highdeas.com decided we wanted bloated posts, drop cieling background, and continued eye-strain.

I chose to ignore this and recreate my WindowsPhone7 based metro theme for this new website design.  First release, comments welcome, stay tokin'.
info.additionalInfo:
Version 1.0
Basic Changes Include...
*Block-styled theme
*Dark color scheme
*Removal of Facebook/twitter buttons
*Stretching header

For feedback, contact me at sea1monkey2@yahoo.com
